hashtag
#HiringAlert - Exciting opportunity for Data Science leaders! 
xto10x is looking for highly experienced individuals to drive one our client's data science initiatives as they head towards an IPO.

Here's a breakdown of the key qualifications they're seeking:
Datascience - IC Leaders / Early Datascience Managers
This role offers a chance to join a Pre-IPO startup and play a crucial part in their growth trajectory.
Key Qualifications:
Education: A Master's degree (PhD preferred) in Machine Learning, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field.

Experience:
8+ years in Data Science or Analytics.
At least 2-3 years of people management experience.
Proven track record of building and deploying ML models in production at scale.
Experience managing teams of 4+ data scientists/engineers and delivering across cross-functional charters.
Technical Expertise:
Deep expertise in ML algorithms, experimental design, and performance monitoring.
Strong coding skills (Python, SQL).
Familiarity with Big Data technologies like Spark, Hive, or Redshift.
If you meet these requirements and are interested in this thrilling opportunity, make sure to share your portfolios with Dipika ator DM me.

I am a Native to the world of Engineering and Digital Technology sector hiring. 

Native connects people and organizations so that they grow effortlessly. We understand the lay of the land through a unique blend of instinct and data. We use this to help people and organizations make smart decisions about where and with whom they work. We call this the Power of Informed Intuition.

With a reach across 15 industries, our 100+ consultants across our 3 offices - Mumbai, Delhi and Bangalore have helped over 3000+ business leaders find companies Native to them. (www.nativeworld.com).

Supported 2 RPO Projects 

Ciena is a networking systems, services, and software company. We help our clients build more adaptive networks in response to the constantly changing demands of their users—businesses and consumers alike. We do this by delivering best-in-class networking technology through high-touch consultative relationships, backed by 26 years of experience in building the world’s most complex networks.

Qlik’s vision is a data-literate world, where everyone can use data and analytics to improve decision-making and solve their most challenging problems. Qlik provides an end-to-end, real-time data integration and analytics cloud platform to close the gaps between data, insights and action. By transforming data into Active Intelligence, businesses can drive better decisions, improve revenue and profitability, and optimize customer relationships. Qlik does business in more than 100 countries and serves over 50,000 customers around the world.

Manage, oversee and support, along-side Program Manager, hiring, performance, and/or pay reviews for the program staff.
Qualify the requisitions with the Managers and understand their Business need. Create Requisitions on IQN and Communicate the same with the Vendors.
Get Suitable profiles and evaluate the professionals before presenting to the Hiring Managers.
Channelize equal participation of Vendors and ensure TAT is according to the SLA ,till the requisition is closed.
Management of the entire recruitment Life cycle candidate On boarding to Off boarding ,Creation of Requisition to Closing Assignments on IQN and Managing the resource day to day Operations including Time Card,Bill rate Approval, Contract renewals.
Evaluate the best rates among the Vendors,and
Act as an Alliance between the Suppliers and the Client.
Relationship Management with key Stakeholders.
Project management over key client / supplier projects
Manages relations with suppliers to assure delivery of service, along-side acquisition and assignment specialists
Supplier evaluation and evaluating their performance on specific parameters annually and suggest measures on better performance.
Lead the team on efficient delivery for Recruitment process.
Customer Interaction, Relationship Management and negotiation for all Operational Activities
Assure Program Processes and Procedures Adherence
Develop and Implement Solutions to Delivery Issues
Coordinating Leadership and Customer Involvement for Problem Resolution and/or Critical Decision Making.
Contribute content to Monthly Operational Reviews (MORs) and Quarterly Business Reviews (QBRs) with client stakeholders

May 11, 2025, Sai managed Dipika directly

Had the pleasure of working with Dipika at both her previous stints with Purple Quarter and Native. I rate her as one of the finest talents in executive search. Her eye for detail while deep diving into the requirements of clients was something that always impressed me in particular. Building a rapport with clients and candidates alike was another impressive trait. Goal oriented and hand on, she was an ever dependent colleague to work with. Wishing her all the very best.

CTO & Product Head at ArisInfra
December 6, 2023, Jitender was Dipika’s client
December 6, 2023,Jitenderwas Dipika’s client
I took help from Dipika to close a critical role in my org recently. She diligently created a profile of the responsibilities from our briefs and created proposals on candidate fitment. She also kept up with our own vision changes in this process. I believe her candidate liaison was exceptional and allowed a very high quality first touch. 

Her ability to drive coveted candidates in a tough economic scenario was unmatched. We appreciated that she worked hard to master our pitch and deliver it with clarity. The discussions, interviews and the closure were all smooth and predictable. 

I highly recommend her and would definitely work with her again.
